episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_02:
Quite a distinguished group of Trainers we’ve
got here...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_03:
Heh, of course! We’ve been around long enough
to have tasted all life has to offer—the bitter an’
the sweet.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_04:
Which is precisely why I’ve gathered you all
here today...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_06:
You veteran Trainers have amassed a treasure
trove of experience, skill, and knowledge...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_07:
I’d like you to impart your wisdom to the younger
generation!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_08:
Our participants are eager to learn from veteran
Trainers from all over the world.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_09:
Count me in! Interacting with younger Trainers is
time well spent for us, too!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_10:
If an old lady like me can be of any help, I’d be
happy to lend a hand.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_12:
(The boss is at it again—saddling me with the
work of teaching younger Trainers...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_15:
(I suppose I could get away with sharing a few
stories about how I overcame some rough days
at work...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4001_1001_18:
(He doesn’t seem too excited about this,
either.)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/6801_1031_01:
I have to expand
my portfolio...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/6801_1001_02: What’s wrong, Larry? Thinking about work?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/6801_1001_03:
Actually, I was thinking about the legwork I need
to do to find a decent restaurant.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/6801_1001_04:
Hahaha! That’s the spirit! A hearty meal will keep
you going, that’s for sure!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/6801_1001_05:
If you find a good spot, let me know! I’d be happy
to join you!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_01: I have known much joy and suffering in my life.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_02:
Since I am your elder, let me show you what
I mean.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_04: Hahaha! No need to be nervous.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_05:
A Pokémon battle is just a way for us to
communicate.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_06:
You know what? We all talk big about what you
learn from battling and bonds and all that, but
really, I just do it ’cause it’s fun.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4002_1001_07:
Who cares about the grandstanding?
Let’s get to battling!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_01:
...And that’s why your instructions to your
Pokémon should be precise and accurate.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_02:
You don’t need fancy moves or outlandish tactics.
Just keep things plain and simple.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_04:
When people and Pokémon try to be different
from everyone else, they just end up with more
work on their plate.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_05:
Um... If you don’t mind, may I ask a question
about you and Dudunsparce?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_06:
I’m sorry, but answering that does not fall within
the scope of my responsibilities...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_07: Whaaaat?! C’mon, don’t hold out on us!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4003_1001_10:
Thank you for your hard work today. I’ll be
off now.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_03: Nice to see you, too, Mister Larry!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_04:
We got curious about how you’re doin’ as a
teacher...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_05:
Uh... You think maybe you could be a little more
amiable?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_08:
Your feedback is acknowledged...but that’s simply
how I teach.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_09:
I’m on my lunch break. If there’s nothing else you
need to discuss with me, I’ll be on my way...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4004_1001_10:
Even after coming to Pasio, he’s still doin’ his own
thing.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_02: (I can see myself becoming a regular there...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_06: You’re...Larry, right? From the Paldea region!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_07:
You were at the workshop earlier! Great to see
you again!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_08: Hello... Pleased to make your acquaintance.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_09: Here’s my business card, if you’re interested.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_11:
I don’t have a business card, but—ah, I know!
You can have this!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_14:
(Kabu, Galar Gym Leader... Started off in
Hoenn...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_15: Anyhow, those workshops sure are great, huh?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_16:
I learned a lot from interacting with younger
Trainers!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_17:
After all, life’s all about training for as long as
you’re alive!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_18:
...Shouldn’t your training be complete once you’ve
reached a certain age, though?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_19:
Hahaha! I suppose that’s another way to think
of it!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_20:
That said, as long as my body can move and my
motivation to fight burns strong, I’ll keep on
running!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_22:
I noticed that the word “veteran” didn’t seem to sit
too well with you.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_23: Is that mindset of yours the reason why?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4005_1001_25: Mind if I tell you a bit about myself?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_01:
I’ve been a Trainer for a long time, and I’ve
experienced a lot in the course of my life.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_02:
There are times, such as today, when I’m even
referred to as a “veteran.”
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_03:
That said, I’m always going to have the mindset
of a rookie.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_05:
When I felt stuck in a rut as a Gym Leader, a
young man showed me how to get out of it.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_06:
That young man was Leon, the unbeatable
Champion of Galar!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_08:
I moved from Hoenn to Galar because I got
scouted.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_09:
I was burning with motivation, but I wasn’t
performing as well as I’d hoped.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_10:
But in my battle with Leon, I found the potential
within me that helped me improve!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_11:
Since then, I’ve had a fresh start, and I’m doing
quite well so far in the major division!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_12:
After going through all that, I don’t want to get
complacent because people call me a veteran...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_13:
I’d rather keep burning—fueled and inspired by
Trainers of all ages!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_18: Sheesh! And all you had to say was “I see”?!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_19: Didn’t you feel anything after hearing all that?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_20:
I think maybe he was trying to tell you something,
Mister Larry...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_21: Well, I’m not so sure of that...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_22:
Either way, I felt it best not to voice my own
opinion...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1001_24: Ah. Time to get back to work...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4006_1101_25:
The veteran Trainers continued to teach the
younger generation...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4007_1001_02:
Whoa, hey! My fiery Rapidash will incinerate
all challengers!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4007_1001_03: Hope you brought some Burn Heals!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4008_1001_02:
First, let me get a glimpse inside your heart...
I want to see if you have fighting spirit!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4008_1001_03:
Don’t hold back! Come at me with everything
you’ve got!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4009_1101_01:
And then there was Larry, who continued to teach
in his own simple, ordinary way...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4009_1001_04: Oh, nothing! Let’s keep going, shall we?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4009_1101_05:
In the blink of an eye, the workshop between the
veteran and younger Trainers came to an end.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_01:
We’ve gotten positive feedback from the
participants!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_02: I think it’s fair to call this event a success!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_03: That’s great news! I’m glad they were satisfied!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_04:
Hey, how about a little party to celebrate a job
well done?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_05: Couldn’t’ve said it better myself! Let’s go hog wild!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_07:
I appreciate the offer, but I’m afraid I must
decline...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_09: It must be difficult having so much work to do.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4010_1001_12:
I have an early day tomorrow. Mind if I head back
with you?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_02:
You have something you’d like to discuss with me,
don’t you?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_03: Hahaha! You saw right through me, huh.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_04:
Larry, is it true that you work double duty as a
Gym Leader and an Elite Four member?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_07: I can tell you’re a very skilled Trainer, Larry.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_08:
You were asked to join the workshops as a
veteran Trainer, so I’m sure you have lots of
experience.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_10: I guess I’m wondering why you’re so...meek.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_11:
And, admittedly, I’m also wondering if you have
something weighing on your mind...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_12:
I thought you might be stuck in the same sort of
rut I was in back in the day.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_14:
My sincerest apologies for any inconvenience I
may have caused. It’s nothing like that.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_16:
Yes. I simply appreciate being ordinary—nothing
more.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_18:
Just as you wish to take on challenges and climb
your way to the top...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_21: You and I have different values and ways of life.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_22: ...I’m not a passionate Trainer like you, Kabu.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_23:
If anything does weigh on my mind...I suppose it’s
that my boss always asks too much of me.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_24:
Bwahahaha! I guess it’s tough being a working
stiff in Paldea!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_25:
I didn’t realize that was just your style. I’m sorry
if I overstepped any boundaries...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_27:
Well, you’ve certainly opened my eyes, Larry!
Thank you!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_28:
If you ever need to vent about that boss of yours,
I’m happy to lend you an ear!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4011_1001_29: If I start talking about her...I may never stop.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_02: You’ve been following me. What do you want?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_04: We’ve just got some plans, is all!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_05:
To take you out and steal your precious partner
Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_07: I’ll help you rethink your rotten motives!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_10: You haven’t seen the worst yet!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_11:
We’re gonna hit you where it REALLY hurts...by
making it rain!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_13: You admitted it the other day, remember?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_14:
You kept going on and on about ALL of your
weaknesses!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_16:
You decided to ambush me after hearing me at
the workshop.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_17: Yeah! We’re perfectly prepared to squash you!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_18:
You don’t even have enough room here
to Dynamax!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_19:
(This isn’t good... Light that fire and get your mind
moving, Kabu!)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_20: (There still must be a path out of this situation!)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_23:
After I wrote about you in my daily report, my
boss told me to keep in touch with you.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_24:
So I thought I’d ask if you’d like to touch base
over lunch...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_25:
In that case, would you like to lend me a hand
here, Larry?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_26:
I’m in a bit of a sticky situation right now—not
sure I can get out of it on my own!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_28: Well, let’s knock this task off our list, then.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_29: OK! Time to resume my lecture...
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4012_1001_30:
Hope you’re ready for an earful... Old-timers like
us tend to spin quite the yarn!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_02:
(No sooner do I finish a task than the next one
comes in...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_03: (The boss is always working me to the bone...)
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_05:
What, did our fearless commander pile more
work onto your plate or somethin’?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_07: Nahahaha! She sure expects a lot outta you, Larry!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_08: You’re still busy, even on Pasio!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_09: Well, that’s a super employee for ya!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_10:
Anyways, you seem like you’re doin’ OK, despite
the intense workload and all.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_11: Your meet-ups with Kabu goin’ well?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_14:
Oops... Sorry, I don’t have much time to chat.
I’m in a hurry to wrap up my tasks.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_15: I simply cannot work any overtime today.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_16:
You’re soundin’ a bit more assertive than usual.
Somethin’ up?
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_17:
...I have plans to go to the hot springs and eat
Hoenn specialties with Kabu after work.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_18:
You’re doin’ WHAT?! Man, good for you! That
sure sounds like a gratifyin’ end to the workday.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_19: I’ll be on my way, then.
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_20: Oh, my! He made friends with Mister Kabu!
episode_event_ch0304_ch0252/4013_1001_21:
Wait a minute... “Hard to say”?! When they’re
CLEARLY hangin’ out and havin’ a good time?!
